mapper.select: SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_deleted = false
SELECT id, name, kana_name, nickname, email, area, age, sex, remark, is_deleted AS deleted FROM students WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (id, name, kana_name, nickname, email, area, age, sex, remark, is_deleted) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{kanaName}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{area}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{remark}, false)
INSERT INTO students_courses (student_id, course_name, start_at, end_at) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{startAt}, #{endAt})
